website_summaries.verdict: Trusted brand name delivers durable chisels with sturdy hardwood handles that hold a sharp edge.
pros: Excellent-quality blades that feature a carbon-chrome steel construction
Tend to hold a sharp edge for a longer period than others
Handles are extremely comfortable to use for long periods of time, and look great
5 chisels ship in a leather pouch for safe storage
cons: Price is higher than some other chisel sets
Some tools may arrive with loose parts

customer_reviews.title: 1 of my chisels came horribly milled -- kind of like it was set in ...
customer_reviews.text: 1 of my chisels came horribly milled -- kind of like it was set in at a funny angle in the grinder at the factory. Amazon's customer service was unapologetic and tried to offer me a $7 refund/discount, if I simply kept the chisel set. $7? Not sure how they came to that number. Not surprisingly, I returned them for a full refund and bought a set of Stanley Sweethearts (750s). MUCH better chisel set. Socket-style handles, better steel, better handle design. Consider spending about $20-$30 and buy the Sweethearts instead. They will last you a lifetime, if maintained properly.
customer_reviews.author: Johl

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with these
customer_reviews.text: I have used marples and narex chisels in this price range. Thought I would try these. Not happy with these. If not for the laquer coating I would have thought they were used. Two chisels had corners that were bent like they had been dropped, and two had chips out of the edges. I would have returned them, but I had them a long time before I opened them. The backs take a very long time to flatten. I have not used them yet, I hope it is worth the time spent getting them ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always been a fan of Stanley products, but these chisels are a joke. Two of them were horribly bent out of the package. They claimed to be extra sharp out of the package but you’d be lucky to cut wrapping paper. Started working on some mortises on a piece of ash and 3 min later the edge of the 1 inch chisel had chips all across the edge. Soft metal, no quality control, and lousy function.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Cowell

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: So the chisels are excellent quality good clean bevels and they were sharp! BUT when I order a product that is brand new I expect the packaging to be unopened not to mention the hammer marks on the butt of the chisel were someone had used them then returned them to Amazon. I'm going to keep them because of course I will mar up the butt from everyday use but disappointed in amazon for this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J Pitts

customer_reviews.title: ... chisels for almost a year now and I'm quite pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: Had these chisels for almost a year now and I'm quite pleased with them. The handles have a unique shape to then that fits my meat paws well. I'm not sure how far the tang extends into the handle, if at all, but a lot of energy seems to get lost in the handle. After a few months of use the ferrules on the chisels that saw more use seemed to loosen and now move quite a bit and some spin freely on the handle. The backs of the chisels needed quite a bit of work to flatten. Good for around 10-15$ a chisel.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Guinto

customer_reviews.title: 4 out 5 chisels weren't bad
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item and was disappointed in the appearance. The box was ripped and opened with the 1" chisel halfway out of the front cover. Additionally, the 1" chisel seemed to have not seated against the ferule fully, this leaving a gap. I will supply a picture. I will have to sharpen these as others have mentioned to remove the lacquer. Overall, they look nice, just was not happy about one of them not appearing professionally crafted. The box was skimpy too, but the leather tool roll is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... had a chance to break these in and really enjoyed it. Upon their arrival I did have to ...
customer_reviews.text: I recently had a chance to break these in and really enjoyed it. Upon their arrival I did have to remove the lacquered finish and sharpen them, but I had to put them back in the leather pouch since I didn't have any real projects going on until this last weekend. They worked amazingly well. I was a little upset that the beating on the butt from the beechwood mallet did mar the strike surface quite heavily, but, what else would happen? The blades kept their sharpness through the project and left me impressed. I'd imagine the Sweetheart (socket) chisels perform better, but these still did a wonderful job. I also enjoy the leather pouch that came with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great, wanted a decent starter set and I’m confident these will do the job. But what happened to the box!? The putter box was taped up and the chisels were all loose from the packaging inside. Luckily there were only minor dings, but certainly not usable until honed. No complaints about the product, but packaging could improve. I ran them through some pine I have and they all cut nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba Chops

customer_reviews.title: A very nice set of chisel's
customer_reviews.text: A very nice set of chisel's. They are stanley / Bailey made in England and very well crafted. Most of the time you just see stanley chisel's on the market and they are so so just average chisel's . These are nothing like them. They are very well made with quality steel and solid handle's . I would recommend these to anyone who work's with wood. Thank's PS: I have over 50 year's in construction under my belt so , that speak's for itself. Last 20 some odd year's a General Contractor.
customer_reviews.author: Old Timer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used them yet but out of the box they are well made, sharp and great quality. I almost hate to use them because they look so nice!! These are the chisels you will take great care of when in use!
customer_reviews.author: Special K

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend you add a little oil to the chisel as ...
customer_reviews.text: It took about an hour to flatten and sharpen all 5 chisels from 400 to 8000 with wet stone (BearMoo) then honed with leather strap. They are razor sharp and hold the edge very well. I would recommend you add a little oil to the chisel as you sharpen, due to the high carbon steel they will start to rust immediately after you take the fine coat of lacquer off of the chisel. I wipe with vegetable oil before I stored them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just right for my needs without overspending. I did ...
customer_reviews.text: Just right for my needs without overspending. I did spend a lot of time prepping them to flatten backs and remove grinding marks. Might have not been totally necessary, but, WOW, they are so much sharper than any chisel I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy workmanship.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for our son. Fortunately I checked them out first and found that 3 had burrs on the underside and had to be cleaned up on emory paper. Sloppy!
customer_reviews.author: jaxbme

customer_reviews.title: wonderful chisels.
customer_reviews.text: I love the handles and the leather pouch, it hangs perfectly on my pegboard in easy reach. The fit and finish is very good. I sharpened and flattened them out of the box, and they were nearly perfectly flat already. It took me about ten minutes each to polish the flat and bevel to a mirror finish. They perform just right, I have used three of them so far, and am more than pleased with edge holding and control. I have not tapped them with a hammer yet, but they seem very sturdy. I would buy these again, and recommend them as well. You have to spend double to get blades that are already sharpened perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good starter chisels
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I got a good product for the price I paid. I shopped for a very long time before making this purchase. Out of the box, 4/5 chisels were hollow on the flat side, no complaints. One was almost dead flat. Bevels were uniform for the most part. Blades all were factory sharpened but not precision ground, I didn't expect that. My only complaint was the hoop in the 1/4 chisel had fallen off during shipment and was bent out of shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality chisels
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality chisels, one of the better made product's I've purchased from Bailey/Stanley. Nice looking handles a leather case and fairly sharp out of the box. A great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Don G.

customer_reviews.title: these are pretty excellent chisels
customer_reviews.text: If you accept the fact that any hand tool with a sharp edge or a machined surface that serves as a reference needs to be tuned (less quality machinists tools and gauges), these are pretty excellent chisels. The blade angle is 25 degrees if you're wondering, and I spent about 5 to 20 minutes flattening and sharpening each chisel, depending on the size. Everything else about these chisels is already posted in other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up from me
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the classic look. Nice hard wood handles instead of plastic. The metal keeps a good edge. I have been using these a lot lately doing doors .I'm very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Einar Erik Volsung

customer_reviews.title: Great chisel set for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice set of chisels for the price and a great option for a beginner or any level of woodworker on a budget. I tried mine straight out of the box without additional sharpening they were all very sharp and seem to be holding an edge pretty well. When I tested for flatness, my set were very close to dead flat. Everything about this chisel set is solid and I didn't experience any issues as some users noted.
customer_reviews.author: eatlocal

customer_reviews.title: Great chisels with a good edge out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful chisels at a great price. The roll that came with it is good quality as well, not really usable as a tool roll but it does have two grommets for hanging on the wall. The chisels come pretty darn sharp out of the box, fit and finish are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Tin cup

customer_reviews.title: A great product with a beautiful leather tool bag, awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chisel set, the pictures do not make justice to the quality of this product. It is beautiful, well-made, with a nice weight!
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as id hoped
customer_reviews.text: Steel is pretty good. Need to sharpen outta the box, but thats a given across the board. The handles are epoxyed on, but my set was not set on straight. Theyve got a slight angle on each of them. Its as if they all got set on their side with the glue still wet, causing the handles to sag. Not sure if id recommend these or not. Seem pricy for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: it worked great out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Very well built. I got two sets that were not manufactured correctly but when I got the right one, it worked great out of the box. Definitely needs a fresh sharpening though if you are doing any fine woodworking.
customer_reviews.author: Dizzo54

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set, a must have for all shops.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set, beautiful leather case. The quality is top notch, the blades do have a slight residue as stated before, it's easily cleaned though. Also, I have read many reviews complaining about the blades not being sharp enough out of the box...this is true, however this is true of every chisel set you'll ever buy. Sharpen your tools regularly and keep them clean and dry. It's a part of life. This set is great, and it will stand up to years of use.
customer_reviews.author: The Little Grey Cell Reader

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and Useful
customer_reviews.text: I've been getting by borrowing a set of chisels for projects as I get into woodworking. I waffled a lot about what I should buy for my own first set and finally settled on these. I am very glad I did. Even my first tests with them were impressive and I can't wait to get into my next project (and return the borrowed set to their owner!) These are beautiful and useful; I expect I'll pass them on to my son.
customer_reviews.author: Erik from Arlington

customer_reviews.title: Very good Value for money set of chisels.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased mine a good 10 months ago. Overall for the price, it is a very descent quality set of chisels. It does tend to hold an edge nicely. initial preparation was quite lengthy, 20 mins per chisel to flatten the back side or it could have been that long due to my inexperienced at that time. These chisels are still serving me good. However, I would have loved the side edges to be bevelled completely so that it doesn't nick my dovetails...
customer_reviews.author: Pravin

customer_reviews.title: Quality and sharp - good for beginning woodworker
customer_reviews.text: Quality stuff for the money if you're a woodworker just getting started. I had the opportunity to use them once and they were really sharp out of the box. I can't really speak to the steel quality, but it looks like if maintained and sharpened regularly, they should last lomg enough for my kid to use them in his teens.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanoski

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Sharp as any I have ever owned. Love them and the leather case is high quality
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Heirloom Quality Wood Chisel Set!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!...These are way nicer than I expected. Almost too nice to use! Comes with nice leather roll-up bag & each chisel has a rosewood (i think) handle, with exquisite craftsmanship. Couldn't be happier! And, the price? How can they sell this set for less than $70.00?
customer_reviews.author: Bill Worden

customer_reviews.title: I have always loved carpentry and nothing compares to a sharp finely honed ...
customer_reviews.text: I am now 65 years old. I work as a architectural project designer. My grandfather was a roycroft carpenter. I have always loved carpentry and nothing compares to a sharp finely honed chisel. When I can make paper from the end grain of a dense exotic wood i am heaven. When I can carve against the grain with little resistance even better. These may be Stanley's best chisels yet. Try em. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Reed

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sharp, great chisels and can't beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is the nicest set of chisels I own. I have a yard sale set (beaters) a Craftsman set (okay but nothing fancy) and this set. I was finally able to use them today. I used the largest and the 1/2" chisel for mortise & tenons on a door frame I'm building. Extremely sharp, fits in my hand good and seems to be well made. Comes with a good leather pouch for storing them in. Looking forward to years of use with these and would buy another set if I ever needed or wanted more.
customer_reviews.author: 1-CHANCE

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: These chisels look good, but one was missing from my box. I returned them, and the return process was quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: W.A. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Chisels
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent chisels, especially for the price. I would not recommend them for dovetails due to the handle design, but they are fantastic for mortise and tenon chopping.
customer_reviews.author: RTS

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great quality for the price. Overall very satisfied. Not sure how long the handles will last, but they're doing fine so far. The rings are not brass, but some kind of plated steel.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set. I'm a beginner but my instructor was ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. I'm a beginner but my instructor was quite surprised that this was the only set that any of the students got that didn't need sharpening and straightening right out of the box. Students often shared tools during the class and everyone seemed pleased with how this chisels seemed to perform
customer_reviews.author: E Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set of bench chisels.
customer_reviews.text: This chisels came sharp enough to use but i did lap the backs and honed them on a diamond stone. I have used these chisels alot and have no complaints. I would recommend these tona friend.
customer_reviews.author: Jacki Berry

customer_reviews.title: Like any chisel set
customer_reviews.text: Like any chisel set, once you get them you have to make a little effort to flatten them and sharpen them properly. Once I did that, these chisels are now slicing through wood like butter. The handles feel nice in your hand and it's got a nice weight to it. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Peled

customer_reviews.title: The chisels are great for the price and with a bit of work ...
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was a mess and some of the chisels ended up getting damaged by the cutting edge. I was surprised as usually with my other Amazon purchases I've never really had a problem with packaging. The chisels are great for the price and with a bit of work I was able to sharpen and fine tune them. So far I'm happy with my purchase would recommend buying this set.
customer_reviews.author: Sloe37

customer_reviews.title: These are darn nice chisels. They are pretty much flat on one ...
customer_reviews.text: These are darn nice chisels. They are pretty much flat on one side and pretty much angled as they should be on the other side. You have to tune up any chisel, so this is a good start, and they tune up into nice, sharp, chisels. The handles are delightful and the whole package is relatively cheap. You could do a lot worse.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made and presented
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fabulous. Well made. VERY sharp and easy to use. They give you a lot of cred when you use them, especially in front of tradesmen!
customer_reviews.author: Mel G

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be a very good chisel set, can't wait for grandsons visit !
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my grandsons to learn with, seem to be very good quality, not an undersized handle, and good edge out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Eric R.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chisels and shipped with a super sharp edge
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in the "used-like new" category. Beautiful chisels and shipped with a super sharp edge. The chisels are made in Sheffield and eschew quality and I even like the leather roll up they came in. They cut beautifully and for the money I paid I am more than impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Chrisk1970

customer_reviews.title: Need to be flattened and sharpened, but they hold ...
customer_reviews.text: Need to be flattened and sharpened, but they hold an edge well. Exactly what I expected and a bit more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob C.

customer_reviews.title: Best chisels ever
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite tools in my shop. Stanley never disappoint and this is no exception. This is probably one of the best chisels I have ever purchased. This is a highly recommended item.
customer_reviews.author: A. Finch

customer_reviews.title: Pretty.  Sharp, but could always be sharper.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking set. Seem pretty sharp, but when is factory-sharp ever good enough for us tinkerers? I'm pretty new to sharpening, so I'll leave these for a while and practice on my old, battered Buck Bros. Home Depot chisels first.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Once the lacquer finish was removed there was a nice machined edge on each one.
customer_reviews.author: potterer

customer_reviews.title: Nice BUT...
customer_reviews.text: Nice set BUT the box came damaged and all of the pieces were loose. I bought this for a Christmas gift and am bummed about the shape it’s in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You know you have a good tool when you look for excuses to use it.
customer_reviews.text: Quite glad I bought this set. I chiseled everything I could think of for a while even when there were more appropriate solutions.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bishop

customer_reviews.title: I will not know the quality until I use them ...
customer_reviews.text: I will not know the quality until I use them over and over and sharpen them over and over but for now I can say that one of the 5 chisels was chipped on the edge. All chisels werent sharp from the box
customer_reviews.author: ValVe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I'm getting into learning carpentry and thought I'll start with a good set of chisels. Well, these set look very nice and very well made. They are made in England.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Luke

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while to sharpen!
customer_reviews.text: It took several passes over a 220 grit water-stone to get the grinder marks off the bottom of the chisels. I can say though that they are completely flat! That part was much appreciated! Somewhere in my research I remember reading that they paid close attention to making sure their chisels were flat and it would seem to have paid off. I was able to polish the back and the edge to a mirror finish and they are razor sharp. I started with a 220 to get the back smooth and then went through 1000/4000/8000. The steel seems to be hard enough to maintain a decent edge. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Terwillager

customer_reviews.title: Terrific price and service
customer_reviews.text: Arrived after five days from order and with the no rush policy. Total charge was $55. Terrific price and service. All five pieces are in correct condition. They will need some fine tuning to get proper sharpness, but I am a happy camper. Go for it.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Lehr

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chisels.
customer_reviews.text: Came quite sharp and needed very little work to get them very flat and beveled! Nice solid
customer_reviews.author: S. House

customer_reviews.title: Good chisels
customer_reviews.text: Good chisels but required additional sharpening for that crisp and clean cut. I use my tools,sharp,always
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set of reasonably price chisels.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set of chisels. Fine finish, actually came reasonable sharp out of the box. The fabric tool roll is quite functional and protects the blades well. Good quality all round. Nice feel in your hand. If they hold up as well as I expect, should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: GMays

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: They feel great in my hand, and stay sharp longer than most chisels.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged an used
customer_reviews.text: The largest chisel came very damaged, clearly used. Has nicks, scratched blade and the wood is gouged and has marks all on it. Disappointed as the undamaged ones need sharpening as well.
customer_reviews.author: HowdyAlabama

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price!
customer_reviews.text: for a lower end chisel set these work quite well! Be sure you have a sharpener on hand to keep them working like new. I would purchase them again!
customer_reviews.author: I'm BATman

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift for a Very Special Friend.
customer_reviews.text: My friend was so ticked with this gift that he vowed not to even "leave these in his Woodshop because he could not stand the thought that a bit of rust could possibly get near them". He stated that he had had chisels before, but nothing to compare with these................the Cadillac of chisels, he says. I personally was impressed with the leather case in which to keep them stored. Great gift for any person who does serious woodworking and dovetailing.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Fox Rogers

customer_reviews.title: I like them and consider them a great
customer_reviews.text: Flattened and honed. Chisels are sharp and hold an edge. I like them and consider them a great buy
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Heirloom quality tools
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift. Recipient was over the moon and very impressed by the quality.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Behrens

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Those are of great quality and they stay sharp because they use great steel
customer_reviews.author: Claude

customer_reviews.title: Fine tools
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with these chisels. The finish is beautiful--flat back and clean bevels. The handles are a good fit in the hand, but robust for mallet work. Best of all, the steel takes and holds a wonderful edge--you can work with a lot of confidence. Great value too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: Love these chisels
customer_reviews.text: Love these chisels, good quality even though the 1/4 " came bent. Had that not happened would have given 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: John and Chacity

customer_reviews.title: ... chisels for a few months now and they're very good. They're fairly flat and sharp out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I've owned these chisels for a few months now and they're very good. They're fairly flat and sharp out of the box, but I sharpened them a bit more after the first use and now they cut through wood like butter. So far I haven't had to re-sharpen them. The edge retention is very good. The leather roll it comes with is very handy for protection and transporting the chisels.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett L Darnell

customer_reviews.title: Middling useful
customer_reviews.text: The steel has a tendency to brittleness. That makes them chisels rather more difficult to sharpen and easier to nick in use.
customer_reviews.author: MarshallTown

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Present
customer_reviews.text: For my son who likes to make things with wood. I'm not an expert on this type of tool, so read the other reviews if you want to know what a real woodworker thinks. But he likes them and they were just what he was looking for. I think it was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: myshopper

customer_reviews.title: and I really like them. They stay really sharp
customer_reviews.text: I've used this set to do several projects now, and I really like them. They stay really sharp, and the handles are comfy for long hours of usage.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Tool Upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I haven't have these for a long time, but my initial impression is very positive. These are an upgrade purchase from an older big box set of stanley chisels and are a big improvement. They sharped easily (they were sharp on arrival, but not as sharp as I prefer for my use) and appear to stay reasonably sharp for an adequate time. (much easier to sharpen than my old set) The wooden handles are comfortable and functional. The leather pouch was a pleasant surprise. It holds the set and I'm currently using it with a couple of hooks on my tool wall.
customer_reviews.author: B Gates

customer_reviews.title: Quality Chisel Set
customer_reviews.text: Good Solid chisels but they need additional sharpening before using them. I prefer a very sharp chisel for my woodworking. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ed P.

customer_reviews.title: These chisels are wonderful for novice carpenters and joiners
customer_reviews.text: These chisels are wonderful for novice carpenters and joiners. The only problem I had was the brass end keeps falling off the middle chisel and my gluing attempts to fix it have been unsuccessful. If you aren't working with them every day it's fine, but If you intend on joining for a living, get yourself a higher quality set.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Brown

customer_reviews.title: quality
customer_reviews.text: quality chisel set at a great price. i'm not the experienced carpenter that i'd like to be but i know a quality tool when i use one. these will last me a while as long as i take care of them.
customer_reviews.author: Win

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing. as others have noted they take a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing. as others have noted they take a bit of sharpening to clear the machine marks on the back, especially for the smaller sizes but with that out of the way they appear to hold an edge well. Excellent choice for the price.
customer_reviews.author: jinksto

customer_reviews.title: Meh, you could do better...
customer_reviews.text: As with all chisels, they do not come pre-sharpened right out of the box. You have to do it yourself. The back is hard to flatten and the front is hard to sharpen using wetstones. That means that the steel is pretty hard and of good quality. It takes a while but eventually you'll get it. On two of the chisels, the brass ferrules came off. Not really a problem as I glued them back on. However, that should have to happen since they are brand new. It's probably due to changes in the wood. Anyway, there are probably better quality chisels out there.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre E Acebedo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and sharp chisels
customer_reviews.text: These chisels come really sharp out of the box, and the leather pouch is a nice touch too. I probably won't really use the 1" or 1-1/4" ones too much, but they're at least nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great Chisel Set!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, as sharp as expected out of box but needing some love like any new set. Definitely would recommend and came with a nice roll up bag.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria Fairley

customer_reviews.title: They were good right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: They were good right out of the box, I use these all the time and once you get a good edge they work even better with a nice feel.
customer_reviews.author: tyler hickox

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: I think this is an outstanding chisel set for the money. Holds an edge well. I like the handles, although I might like them more if they were a little longer.

customer_reviews.title: they came in good shape none of the problems some of the reviewer's ...
customer_reviews.text: received them havent used them yet. they came in good shape none of the problems some of the reviewer's had with chipped edges. seems to be an awesome set of chisels. time will tell as i sharpen and use them

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: they certainly do not seem of anything but excellent quality well above the price
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in NZ within a week or so of ordering, and although I have yet to touch them up and use them, they certainly do not seem of anything but excellent quality well above the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality good feel
customer_reviews.text: High quality good feel, won't have any problems with your hands. Stay sharp as long as I would expect. All in all a very good set of chisels, especially for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing. Strong handles
customer_reviews.text: My first set of chisels. Works amazing. Strong handles, great steel!

customer_reviews.title: S to New Zealand that's pretty impressive. Very happy with them and I'm sure ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these chisels on Wednesday night. They arrived at my house before midday the following Monday. From the U.S to New Zealand that's pretty impressive. Very happy with them and I'm sure they'll go well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made and comes with an excellent suede leather tool ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made and comes with an excellent suede leather tool roll. They do require a final honing to remove grinding marks and burrs.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Ansley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Chisel set
customer_reviews.text: Sharpened up very nicely. Feel very good in my hand while working. Built a beautiful box for them, too. they are now complete.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not bad right out of the box, but sharpens up great. The nubuck wrap is a nice perk
customer_reviews.author: Tom Lin

customer_reviews.title: The chisels are great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: The chisels are great quality for the price. They come with probably your standard box store level of sharpness. They probably aren't shipped razor sharp for obvious reasons. Anyone who complains about that probably had no idea how to sharpen a chisel. I spent 5 minutes on each chisel to fine tune the bevels. I can handle that for $60.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great chisels for the price
customer_reviews.text: Sharp enough to shave hair right off your arm. Great chisels, you can beat them up without having to sharpen freqeuently. I love them!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice set, arrived very very sharp - i highly recommend them for the above average wood worker

product_meta.title: Stanley 16-401 Bailey Chisel Set, 5-Piece
product_meta.description:
16-401 bly 5pc chisel pouch. Stanley Hand Tools is a brand of hand tools. It is a division of Stanley Black & Decker, following the 2010 merger of The Stanley Works with Black & Decker

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
This five piece Bailey chisel set is perfect for the serious woodworker who demands perfection. Designed with stained beech handles and an upgraded brass ferrule, these high quality chisels will help the experienced craftsman achieve what he/she is capable of. These chisels have an improved blade finish with new grinding centers. Manufactured in Sheffield England, Bailey Chisels are known for unsurpassed quality. This 5 piece set includes the following sizes: 1/4-Inch (6mm), 1/2-Inch (12mm), 3/4-Inch (19mm), 1-Inch (24mm), and 1-1/4-Inch (32mm).
feature_bullets: Micro-precision grind for superior sharpness out of the box
Blade lacquered for corrosion protection Hardwood handle for comfort and impact resistance

Includes high-quality leather pouch for storage, Contains: 16-975 - Bailey Chisel 1/4-Inch 16-977 - Bailey Chisel 1/2-Inch 16-978 - Bailey Chisel 3/4-Inch 16-979 - Bailey Chisel 1 -Inch 16-980 - Bailey Chisel 1-1/4-Inch
Hardwood handle for comfort and impact resistance
High-quality carbon-chrome steel for edge retention

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars299 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
